title: How to Compete and Win with Artificial Intelligence
itunes:title: How to Compete and Win with Artificial Intelligence
description:
Ash Fontana, Managing Director of Zetta, discusses his book "The AI-First Company” on why companies need to prioritize artificial intelligence to succeed.

Host; Carol Massar. Producer: Paul Brennan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
